about_the_game:
In Devils's Dream you play as James, a student which want to examine an abandoned place. He and his girlfriend Sophie drove in the late of the Night to the place and get what they hadn't expected. Try to Survive the Night. You are trapped in the building and try to find and escape from there. Most of the Doors are closed and you have to find the Key for them.

Gameplay
You have to find and collect all of the key which leads you to the freedom

Controls
KEYBOARD
W = Move Foward
A = Move Left
S = Move Backwards
D = Move Right
Q = Peek Left Around Corners
E = Peek Right Around Corners
F = Flashlight
C = Cameroid
V = Nightvision Camera
Shift = Run
Left Ctrl = Crouch
P = Graphics Settings

MOUSE
Left Click = Pickup Items / Open Doors
Right Click = Select Doors to use Keys on it
